pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, February 1, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

1:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual conversation with Willie O'Ree, Sarah Nurse, and students from classrooms across the country for the Canadian launch of “Social Justice & Racism Lessons from Willie O'Ree”.

Notes for media:

  • Media wishing to view the event must register before 12:00 p.m. by sending an email to video@classroomchampions.org.
  • Media are asked to log on no later than 1:10 p.m.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
